scripts.update: rm -r -f source/_posts && git clone -q https://git.ms.netease.com/lede/blog.git source/_posts
scripts.generate: npm run update && npm run clean && hexo g
scripts.g: npm run update && npm run clean && hexo g
scripts.start: cnpm cache clean && cnpm install && forever -p ./ -l ./logs/access.log -a start app.js
